mapper.insert: insert into lead(lead_id, created_by, last_upd_by, reg_chnl_cd, con_type_cd, brand_cd, spec_desc, pros_id) values((seq_lead.nextval+1000000000), #{created_by}, #{last_upd_by}, #{reg_chnl_cd}, #{con_type_cd},#{brand_cd}, #{spec_desc}, #{pros_id})
